abstract.p: Effem, division of Mars Inc, consolidates its media planning and buying account in Canada at MediaVest Canada, part of Starcom MediaVest Group unit of Bcom3 Group; billings for account undisclosed (S)

block.p: Effem, a division of Mars Inc., consolidated its media planning and buying account in Canada at MediaVest Canada, part of the Starcom MediaVest Group unit of the Bcom3 Group. Billings for the account, which includes media planning and buying in Canada for products like Uncle Ben's and Snickers, were not disclosed.

Effem, a division of Mars Inc., consolidated its media planning and buying account in Canada at MediaVest Canada, part of the Starcom MediaVest Group unit of the Bcom3 Group. Billings for the account, which includes media planning and buying in Canada for products like Uncle Ben's and Snickers, were not disclosed.

Richard Kellam, marketing director at Effem in Bolton, Ontario, said the decision came after a three-month review that had been narrowed to MediaVest and the three other Toronto agencies that had also previously handled the account: MediaCom, part of the Grey Global Group; Optimum Media Direction, part of the Omnicom Group; and Zenith Media, owned by the Cordiant Communications Group and the Saatchi & Saatchi unit of the Publicis Groupe S.A.
